wunderlist.title: TODOs
wunderlist.description: The TODOs widget monitors how many tasks are due on that day. I use Wunderlist to track small tasks only (eg 'going to the post office').

email.title: Email
email.description: The email widget monitors how many emails are currently in my inbox. I manage regular subscriptions with Unroll.me so I only get one email per day for subscription emails.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: I keep in touch with a few of my close friends by writing a monthly-ish newsletter, featuring bad puns and terrible doodles.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: I write the occasional technical blog post on my website.

trello.title: Trello
trello.description: I use a Trello board with four sections for longer term projects that I am working on. I track my current projects in the "Ongoing" section. I have three "Ready" sections for projects I'd like to start in the future: drawing projects, writing projects and any others.
